Get ESPN NBA game data (Pbp, Team and Player Box)

Source: R/espn_nba_data.R
espn_nba_game_all.Rd

Get ESPN NBA game data (Pbp, Team and Player Box)

Usage

espn_nba_game_all(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

A named list of data frames: Plays, Team, Player

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_nba_game_all(game_id = 401283399))
